meanings.definition: To affix a sticker to something.
meanings.sent1: She stickered her notebook with colorful stickers.
meanings.sent2: The children stickered their water bottles with their names.
meanings.sent3: He stickered his laptop with so many stickers, it looked like a sticker factory!
meanings.sent4: The city was stickered with campaign posters during election season.
meanings.sent5: The artist stickered the canvas with tiny, intricate designs.

meanings.sent1: The stickered laptop looked unique among the plain ones.
meanings.sent2: The stickered skateboard caught everyone's attention at the park.
meanings.sent3: The stickered guitar seemed to play more melodious tunes.
meanings.sent4: The stickered car stood out in the parking lot like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The stickered notebook was easily recognizable in the sea of plain ones.
